sections.text: "Derivative proceeding" means a civil action in the right of a domestic corporation or, to the extent provided in ยง 29-305.57, in the right of a foreign corporation.
"Shareholder" includes a beneficial owner whose shares are held in a voting trust or held by a nominee on the beneficial owner's behalf.
